tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    interests VARCHAR(255),
    learning_style VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE StudentConnections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student1_id INT,
    student2_id INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (student1_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student2_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);
CREATE TABLE students ( student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, interest_id INT, learning_style VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE interests ( interest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, interest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE learning_styles ( style_id INT PRIMARY KEY, style_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE student_interests ( student_id INT, interest_id INT, PRIMARY KEY(student_id, interest_id), FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id), FOREIGN KEY(interest_id) REFERENCES interests(interest_id) )

CREATE TABLE student_styles ( student_id INT, style_id INT, PRIMARY KEY(student_id, style_id), FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id), FOREIGN KEY(style_id) REFERENCES learning_styles(style_id) )
